channel.title: Webclient isnt working with the server?
channel.description: http://www.thestaticgame.com/about.html my webclient the cache download 50% of the time this is a webclient and server problem the client shows it connecting to my ip and port but the server says its online but i can change everything it still says its online with no ip to connect to i think its still on local how do i get it off local to my real host ip? im using no-ip and i have that set up to.
